title: Beef stew and dumplings for the slow cooker
ingredients: ['450g (1lb) stewing steak, cubed', '450g (1lb) carrots, chopped', '450g (1lb) swede, peeled and chopped', '450g (1lb) parsnips, chopped', '450g (1lb) onions, chopped', 'boiling water as needed', '3 beef stock cubes', '1 packet dumpling mix', '1 tablespoon mixed herbs']
